Has the dragon historically served as China's national emblem?	yes

Do pandas hibernate?	no

Do giant pandas attack humans?	yes
Do giant pandas attack humans?	Yes
What family is the panda a part of?	Ursidae (bear)

How long does it take for the panda cubs skin to turn gray?	one to two weeks after birth

What foods do pandas eat?	bamboo
What foods do pandas eat?	bamboo, honeys, eggs, fish, yams, shrub leaves, oranges, and bananas
What are the two subspecies of giant pandas?	Ailuropoda melanoleuca melanoleuca and  Ailuropoda melanoleuca qinlingensis 
What are the two subspecies of giant pandas?	Ailuropoda melanoleuca melanoleuca and The Qinling Panda, Ailuropoda melanoleuca qinlingensis
What is panda diplomacy?	Loans of Giant Pandas to American and Japanese zoos

Is the Giant Panda an endangered species?	yes

Where do Giant Pandas live?	a few mountain ranges in central china
Where do Giant Pandas live?	Sichuan province, Shaanxi and Gansu provinces

How many subspecies of the Giant Panda are there?	Two

Is the Giant Panda a carnivore?	Yes
Why is the Giant Panda an endangered species?	threatened by habitat loss
Why is the Giant Panda an endangered species?	It is threatened by continued habitat loss and by a very low birthrate
Is the population of wild Giant  Pandas growing?	according to some reports, yes
Is the population of wild Giant  Pandas growing?	Yes but uncertain
